Value.label: Rain Counter
Value.Help: Ths values shows the total count of rain from the moment of inclusion in mm waterlevel. By writing this value this counter can be reset. Size: 2 Byte, Default Value: 0

Value.label: Rain Start Command
Value.Help: This BASIC Set Command value is sent out into Association Group 2 when the device detects start of rain Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 99

Value.label: Rain Stop Command
Value.Help: This BASIC Set Command value is sent out into Association Group 2 when the device detects stop of rain Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 0

Value.label: Meter Multiplier
Value.Help: This multiplier allows to adapt the display to certain controllers not being able to handle very low numbers. Availible settings: 1, 10, 100 and 1000 Size: 2 Byte, Default Value: 1

Value.label: Heavy Rain
Value.Help: This threshold defines when a heavy rain condition is hit. In most countries this is defined as > 15 mm rain per hour. The edefaut value however is to turn this function off. Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 256

Value.label: Heavy Rain Start Command
Value.Help: This BASIC Set Command value is sent out into Association Group 3 when the device detects start of heavy rain Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 99

Value.label: Heavy Rain Stop Command
Value.Help: This BASIC Set Command value is sent out into Association Group 3 when the device detects stop of heavy rain Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 0

Group.label: Switching Command when Rain (> 0 mm/h). Basic Set Command is sent.
Heavy Rain detected. Basic Set Command is sent.
